subtitle: RSI computed over the last hour — recent intraday momentum.

measures.how_to_read: < 30 oversold; > 70 overbought for last hour only.
measures.typical_ranges: Session dependent; use with caution near open/close.
measures.caveats: Short lookback; noisy and fast changing.
measures.what_it_measures: Rsi Last Hour derived from market data.
